extendedInfo.description: â Now with FREE to enter PRIZE games.â Featured in The Sunday Times âTop 500 Apps in the Worldâ.âA fiendishly addictive time-killer, this pits you against improving opposition, from pub player Barry Bumble to world championship legends Eric Bristow and John Lowe. The mechanics are simple, and you get used to the frustration of seeing your once-a-week 180 denied by the wire. Sid Waddell style commentary and feverish announcements keep a rowdy crowd on the edge of their seats.â The Sunday Times 29-01-2012 âââââ Have You Got The Bulls? Take your darts skills out of your local and challenge players worldwide, without even having to buy them a pint, with Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE. Players will need timing, accuracy and nerve to rise to the top of the league in this absorbing game, which was originally developed from a âSkill with Prizesâ (SWP) pub machine by leading UK independent developer FatSpanner. âThis is not a simulator, it takes the strategic rather than the physical elements of the darts game. âLegends of Darts enjoyed tens of millions of plays in UK pubs before we developed the original iPhone game, Legends of Darts WORLD MASTERS. Building on the success of the original iPhone top 10 game Legends of Darts WORLD MASTERS, Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE takes arcade darts to another level. Play against friends or hundreds of thousands of other players online in both league play and exclusive tournaments. Legends of Darts PRO ONLINE features... â¢Online worldwide league play and world rankings. â¢Regular online tournaments. â¢Worldwide hall of fame. â¢Play your friends online or via Bluetooth. â¢âShot Outâ aid to help with mental arithmetic in the heat of battle. â¢Play left or right handed. â¢Optional âZoomâ feature. â¢Listen to your own music while playing. â¢Improved game play.What's New in this VersionFeatures â¢iPad3 compatible â¢Online name retrieval using password system â¢Same Online name can be used on multiple devices (not at the same time) â¢Online name change made easier â¢Handicap competitions â¢'Paid' version only online competitions â¢Took in-game adverts off Lite version to make gamely smoother Improvements to network reliability

reviews.title: Mr darts
reviews.comment: Very good game does need some type of system so as to play at your own leval..some people can just hit 9 darters all the time..
reviews.author: Matthew Bulmer

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Y when u have a few days before tournaments finish it freezes and u cant get to play. It happens everytime Without this cliche it is otherwise a great game
reviews.author: Lynn Bice

reviews.title: Not the worst game
reviews.comment: Be better if the opponents were of similar ability, get beat from people who obviously spend far too long playing games like this! Would also be better if you could search for opponents by username
reviews.author: Raymond Simpson

reviews.title: SERVER ERROR
reviews.comment: This game is super fun BUT I haven\'t been able to play for almost a week now because it will not connect to server. PLEASE FIX THIS ANNOYING PROBLEM! I did pay for this app!
reviews.author: Steph Sing

reviews.title: HTC
reviews.comment: Worst app out work then don\'t work then work then just stops working all together very poor
reviews.author: Garry Mccourt

reviews.title: wayne walton\'s review
reviews.comment: As a darts player I found this game very exciting. The online aspect is fantastic great overall
reviews.author: Wayne Walton

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Only thing i would like to see added is cutomizeation to flights,stems,barrels etc unlocked by achivemeants e.g hit so many 9 darters, so many 180s, so many 170 checkouts, getting promoted etc etc also i would like to hear a little more scoring not just 100-140-180 (if this happens ill be buying the pro edition for sure and im posative many more will too!)
reviews.author: Adam Murray

reviews.title: legend of darts
reviews.comment: Very good game, fun and addictive nice commentary.good free game.
reviews.author: Nicha Smith

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Game seems awesome but so frustrating ...server error..all the time when I try to play online....please fix please.
reviews.author: John Rogers

reviews.title: Too easy
reviews.comment: Online is poor - most of the time it says \'searching for an opponent\' for 5 minutes then disconnects. When you do get online its full of players who get constant 9 dart finishes which means the game comes down to a 1 dart nearest the bull to see who throws first. Needs improvement
reviews.author: M L Cunn

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: A bit easy on all difficulty levels but great amusement for darts fans! Possibility of becoming boring after a while but not tried competing online yet - maybe that\'s what I need to do next!!?
reviews.author: Se\303\241n Lysaght

reviews.title: THE BEST DART GAME EVER!
reviews.comment: I play this game everyday since I\'ve downloaded it I can TRULY say that I\'m addicted to this game and the funny thing is I hated playing darts for years i didn\'t getvany enjoyment from it til I found this app n it was a wrap after that ;-) lol...   I recommend this app #1 in my book
reviews.author: Lovely Aquarius

reviews.title: Great game but.....
reviews.comment: A highly enjoyable and addictive game spoilt by constant server problems, that\'s the only thing stopping me from upgrading to the pro version, if they sorted out that issue then this game would be 5 stars.
reviews.author: alan higgins

reviews.title: legends of darts
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy   SIII user. Server error or disconnected during match. Unable to reconnect in time.  What would be great is if you could as a player look for, play or challenge friends or even have friends list to locate. Over all its a fun game and there should be leavel areas of play for us that just wan to kill time and have fun.
reviews.author: R. Bear Monteiro

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Really good fun, you have to be able to take a good thrashing every now and again though (im not) some of the reviews on here have been written by morons as they are whinging because there losing lol. Most stressfull thing for me is it can  loose connection every now again but not everythings perfect. Other people are moaning because they want to know who the person is there playing? Anyway rant over - Top game, great way to pass an hour or three.
reviews.author: Richard Mullins

reviews.title: Top Game
reviews.comment: Love this game. Game plays pretty standard but the mc, crowd and even the clever simulation when your vs com gives this game a great feel. Addicted already
reviews.author: Simon Hastings

reviews.title: Was fun, now stopped working
reviews.comment: Its stopped working for me, says \'another device online with my ID\'. Was a great game before that and would be 5 stars. Although its annoying when throwing for bull and you hit it but still lose the throw.
reviews.author: Anthony B

reviews.title: great game
reviews.comment: I have spent alot of time playing this game and i love it.i wish u could pic ur opponents or chat with them during a game or win points to purchase  different darts or flights. But the play of the game and the pace is great
reviews.author: Mike Snider

reviews.title: Couple of tweeks needed
reviews.comment: Great game I like it alot but if only you was given a slightly longer time to throw your arrows,  it\'s frustrating when it takes over and you lose the chance to gain a higher score,  also when your playing someone can we see what country their from? Or the option for a profile pic
reviews.author: Pete Dixon

reviews.title: Keeps Crashing
reviews.comment: A great darts game, just need to sort out the fact that sometimes it crashes when trying to play online. Please fix and then I will give 5 stars. Cheers
reviews.author: Samantha Smith
